summary: The Defense Quantum Acceleration Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Defense to accelerate the adoption and implementation of quantum information science technologies within the Department of Defense. It mandates the designation of a Principal Quantum Advisor, outlines activities for identifying and transitioning quantum technologies, establishes a National Security quantum information science joint center of excellence, and requires a strategic plan for quantum technology development. The Act also aims to enhance industry and academia engagement, promote allied cooperation (specifically AUKUS), and address workforce development within the Department.
